World Health Organisation 2000-2025 World Standard Population

who_2000_2025_standard_population.Rd

The Standard in SEER*Stat for the 90-94 age group needed to be increased by one so the total would sum to 1,000,000. That group was selected because it was the number closest to rounding up that did not.

Usage

who_2000_2025_standard_population

Format

who_2000_2025_standard_population

age_group

Age Group

who_world_standard_percent

WHO World Standard (%)

recalculation_to_add_to_1million

Recalculation to add to 1,000,000

rounded_to_integers

Rounded to Integers

standard_for_seer_stat

Standard For SEER*Stat

lower_age_limit

Lower limit for age group

Source

https://seer.cancer.gov/stdpopulations/world.who.html
